name: Rage of Apedemak
rules: Always indicated in Global Notes of your game if IRL events are preventing you for playing.
Players are expected to connect TWICE a day during week days (Mondays to Fridays) to ensure interaction with the tables are not delayed
Players can interact and play during weekend
Ensure you are clear on declarations of actions, blocks and/or terms of political actions

specialRules.condition: The following JOL rules will be enforced for the duration of the rounds with the exception of the period between 22nd December and 4th January.
rules: if a Methuselah hasn't put anything in global notes about being away, then 24 hours (within weekdays and not weekends) without responding is considered a non-response impulse will be pass. If they are receiving the impulse again game will stop for a week, no answer in one week will make the player to be removed from that table, VP and 6 pool to the predator will be considered by the judge team and might or might not be awarded depending on table balance.
For any question or query about applying this, players can call a judge who is not playing at the table to make a decision.
